name: LumiJobs
title: LumiJobs is a Hiring Agency and Communicational Platform where The Job Seekers and the Jobs Providers can attached in a real-time application tracking system.
features: Real-time job listing, Search, Multi-filter, Skills-based job suggestions
Bookmark, Pagination, Job Share, Applicants number in the Job post
Subscription and Payment Gateway, Blogs and Seminars
Profile upgrade, view, customization, dashboard management
Job Apply, Job management, Application tracking

name: SAVE LIFE MEDICAL CAMP
title: Save Life Medical Camp is a medical service provider website. Where you can get different types of medical campaign information, you can join a camp by registering yourself.
features: Smooth and Responsive Design, User Friendly
Medical Campaign creation, Arrangement, Manage Functions
User can register for a camp
Payment Gateway through Stripe, Payment System and History

name: SOFT BLOG
title: A blog site, where you can read and write different categories blogs.
features: Authenticated user can read and write blogs
User can save blogs to his/her wishlist
User can search blogs by category or title
Latest blog updated automatically shown on home page
Reaction on post, Comment system, Text editor for creating post
